text: Zubarán circa 1914 Rafael Epifanio Zubarán Capmany (7 April 1875Mexico, Select Baptisms, 1560-1950 – 1 February 1948)Federal District, Mexico, Civil Registration Deaths, 1861-1987 was a Mexican lawyer from Campeche who acted as the Mexican Minister of Interior and a representative for the ABC nations in 1914 during the Niagara Falls peace conference. He was Mexican Secretary of Economy from 1920 to 1922. title: Rafael Zubarán Capmany
